on reading compounds: 値域【チイキ】range (of a function or relation)
経験値【ケイケンチ】amount of experience, experience point (in video games, etc.), exp, XP
kun reading compounds: 値【ね】price, cost, value, worth, merit
値上がり【ねあがり】price advance, increase in value
値【あたい】price, cost, value, worth, merit, value
値する【あたいする】to be worth, to be worthy of, to deserve, to merit
最初の値【さいしょのあたい】initial value
